[Home](./index.md) &gt; [clm-core](./clm-core.md) &gt; [AdapterInterface](./clm-core.adapterinterface.md)

## AdapterInterface interface

Interface which database-connectors need to implement. `Datamodel` is the struture of the document which will be saved in the db. Has to extend [BaseDatamodel](./clm-core.basedatamodel.md)

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export default interface AdapterInterface<Datamodel extends BaseDatamodel> 
```

## Properties

|  Property | Modifiers | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- | --- |
|  [isInitialized](./clm-core.adapterinterface.isinitialized.md) |  | boolean | Whether the adapter is already initialized |
|  [tableName](./clm-core.adapterinterface.tablename.md) |  | string | The namespace where the document will be saved |

## Methods

|  Method | Description |
|  --- | --- |
|  [bulkDelete(payload)](./clm-core.adapterinterface.bulkdelete.md) | Bulk deletes documents from the database |
|  [bulkInsert(payload)](./clm-core.adapterinterface.bulkinsert.md) | Bulk inserts documents into the database |
|  [bulkUpdate(payload)](./clm-core.adapterinterface.bulkupdate.md) | Bulk updates documents from the database |
|  [deleteById(id)](./clm-core.adapterinterface.deletebyid.md) | Deletes document by id |
|  [findAll(options)](./clm-core.adapterinterface.findall.md) | Find all the documents from the database |
|  [findByAttributes(searchObject)](./clm-core.adapterinterface.findbyattributes.md) | Finds document bt attributes |
|  [findById(id, options)](./clm-core.adapterinterface.findbyid.md) | Finds the document by id |
|  [init()](./clm-core.adapterinterface.init.md) | Database specific instructions to be executed before the adapter can be used. For example creating the table with respective tablename in the database. The param  must be set to true after the init function is executed. |
|  [insert(payload, options)](./clm-core.adapterinterface.insert.md) | Insert a document into the database |
|  [updateById(id, payload)](./clm-core.adapterinterface.updatebyid.md) | Updates document by id |
